isis.stitle: FAN DRIVE CLUTCH: HORTON ON/OFF - EMERGENCY OPERATION

svcproc.title: EMERGENCY OPERATION
svcproc.para: Fan clutches are designed to permit continued operation in the event of a fan clutch or control malfunction. In the event of a fan clutch or control malfunction:

step1.para: Disconnect and plug air line to fan clutch.
Align two holes in piston/friction disc with two holes in sheave ( Figure 3).

figure.caption: Figure 3. Installing Capscrews For Emergency Operation

step1.para: Install two 5/16-18 x 1 inch, Grade 8 socket head capscrews and tighten to 140 to 190 in-lbs. (16 to 21 N•m).

important.para: Clamping the plates together provides turning force, so the bolt torque is very important. The above procedure is only a temporary solution. The problem must be corrected as soon as possible.
